ingredients.item: 220g pack Uncle Ben’s Rice & Grains Wholegrain & Quinoa

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200°C, gas mark 6. Place the peppers, cut side up, in a small roasting tin.
Heat the grains according to pack instructions and mix with the chicken, pine nuts and tomatoes, then season.
Press into the peppers, drizzle with olive oil and bake for 20-25 minutes until the peppers are tender. Serve sprinkled with parsley and a green salad on the side.
